branchCategory.name: VG
branchCategory.description: <p> Series VG342 is a 3 port pilot poppet solenoid valve and can be used as a selector or divider valve (external pilot).  Actuation is changeable between N.C., N.O., or external pilot types.   VG342 is possible to use in vacuum or under low  pressures.  No lubrication is required.  </p> <p> </p>

branchItem.name: 90-VG342, 3 Port Solenoid Valve, Pilot Poppet
